remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串值`text`参数可以是"None"、 或的预定义组合名称用逗号分隔，如"Underline，带删除线"。The string value of the `text` parameter can either be "None", or a combination of the predefined names delimited by commas, such as "Underline, Strikethrough". 名称是不区分大小写的值。The names are case-insensitive values. 一个或多个空格可以前面或后面的每个文本修饰名称或逗号。One or more blanks spaces can precede or follow each text decoration name or comma. 此外，不允许重复的文本修饰名称。In addition, duplicate text decoration names are not allowed.
